title: Resolved minor issue where entering more than 2 decimal places on project capital would cause a mismatch between total capital and monthly capital.
Fixed issue where a user's name and timezone would both be labeled as "Name" in the various configuration screens, making it difficult to know which was which.
Fixed permissions on "Update Actuals Closed Date" to require only an admin with "Accruals Admin" privilege.
Including the same subworkflow multiple times in a workflow is now correctly supported.
Added support for event-based file exports to the Integration Agent. This makes it possible to use Bolo, Excalibur and other integrations from a Quorum hosted instance of Execute.
Support for Enterprise Events in integration agent.
Fixed issue where starting Execute 21 against a Execute 2020 database would automatically add some Execute 21 fields before failing the version check.
Fixed issue where Integration Agent connection would fail if the connection name included mixed case.
Resolve issue where AFEs that were already exported to QByte/enVision would incorrectly show up in the list of AFEs to export when using the Integration Agent.
Resolved issue where Projects would sometimes incorrectly stay in "Due for Forecast" filter even after their forecast was updated.
Resolved issue where the total row could disappear while editing Project forecasts.
Leading and trailing spaces are now trimmed from VARCHAR fields on Document Synchronization.
Moved Peloton Subscription Key out of configuration file and built it into the application.
Huge improvements to the performance of the legacy Create Rights screens for clients with complex rules and many AFE attributes.
Support for AFEStoredProcedureValidator in the Integration Agent.
